long_description: The Alpen Apex XP 8 x 32 waterproof binoculars offer superb optical quality and workmanship with bright, clear viewing-even in dim light and wet conditions. Light, rugged binoculars are designed to provide exceptional viewing at an affordable price. Center focus wheel lets you focus on objects as close as 4 ft. BAK4 glass, phase coating, metallic prism coating and fully multicoated optics ensure a clear, bright, high-resolution view with accurate color fidelity. Sealed and nitrogen-filled body helps ensure waterproof and fogproof performance; rubber armor is comfortable to grip and helps protect binoculars from bumps and drops. Long eye relief and eyecups are perfect for using the binoculars while wearing glasses; eyecups pull up and lock into place with a twist. Alpen Apex XP 8 x 32 waterproof binoculars come with a deluxe travel case and comfortable neck strap.
short_description: The Alpen Apex XP 8 x 32 waterproof binoculars offer superb optical quality and workmanship with bright, clear viewing-even in dim light and wet conditions.
